bin/
obj/
out/

*.user

*.sln.docstates

.vs/
.vscode/
.idea/

*.log

x64/

## NuGet packages
*.nupkg
packages/
.nuget/

## Test Results
TestResults/

*.tmp

*.old

coverage/
*.coverage

.idea/

publish/
